---
title: "Publications about the Icons of the Mountains"

*On this page, publications from our research lab are listed. Only publications about "Icons of the mountains" (i.e. - the iconic vertebrates in the mountains) and only publications emerging from collaboration within the lab are listed. For a full publication list of the lab members, please follow links to our google scholar or orcid sites linked [here](people.qmd).*
